tool_description: Behance, part of the Adobe family, is the leading online platform to showcase & discover creative work.
name: Behance
title: Behance

api_list.name: getUserWipsByUsername
api_list.description: Get the works-in-progress published by a user by username.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: Username on which we will receive data.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The order the results are returned in.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results, always starting with 1.

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by time.

api_list.name: getAllCollections
api_list.description: The getAllCollections endpoints allow you to browse all collections.

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by time.

optional_parameters.name: searchQuery
optional_parameters.description: Free text query string.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The order the results are returned in.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results, always starting with 1.

api_list.name: getAllCreativeFields
api_list.description: Retrieves all Creative Fields in two groups, all fields (in 'fields') and popular ones (in 'popular')

api_list.name: getAllCreativesToFollow
api_list.description: Provides a list of creatives you might be interested in following.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results, always starting with 1.

api_list.name: getAllProjects
api_list.description: The getAllProjects endpoints allow you to browse all projects.

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by time.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by city name.

optional_parameters.name: searchQuery
optional_parameters.description: Free text query string.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by a 2-letter FIPS country code.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by state or province name.

optional_parameters.name: colorRange
optional_parameters.description: How closely to match the requested colorHex, in color shades (default:20) [0-255]

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results, always starting with 1.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The order the results are returned in.

optional_parameters.name: field
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by creative field.Field name from the list of defined creative fields.

optional_parameters.name: colorHex
optional_parameters.description: Limit results to an RGB hex value (without #).

optional_parameters.name: license
optional_parameters.description: Filter by creative license. Acronyms found here: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by tags.

api_list.name: getAllUsers
api_list.description: The getAllUsers endpoints allow you to browse all users.

optional_parameters.name: field
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by creative field.Field name from the list of defined creative fields.

optional_parameters.name: searchQuery
optional_parameters.description: Free text query string.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by state or province name.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results, always starting with 1.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by city name.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The order the results are returned in.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by a 2-letter FIPS country code.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Limits the search by tags.
